items.text_for_match: Oxtoby leaves NI to take over at Newcastle Tanya Oxtoby leaves her role as Northern Ireland manager to become head coach at WSL 2 side Newcastle United. Tanya Oxtoby leaves her role as Northern Ireland manager to become head coach at WSL 2 side Newcastle United.

items.ja: Have we seen the last of Wales and ex-Arsenal star Ramsey?
items.en: Have we seen the last of Wales and ex-Arsenal star Ramsey?
items.text_for_match: Have we seen the last of Wales and ex-Arsenal star Ramsey? items.ja: A look around Barcelona's new-look Nou Camp
items.en: A look around Barcelona's new-look Nou Camp
items.text_for_match: A look around Barcelona's new-look Nou Camp BBC Spanish football reporter Elizabeth Conway shows us around Barcelona's iconic Nou Camp. The stadium will reopen, after more than two years of renovation work, for a game against Athletic Club in La Liga on Saturday. items.ja: Morocco's AS FAR claim second African Women's Champions League title
items.en: Morocco's AS FAR claim second African Women's Champions League title
items.text_for_match: Morocco's AS FAR claim second African Women's Champions League title AS FAR beat debutants ASEC Mimosas 2-1 in the African Women's Champions League final to become continental champions for the second time. AS FAR beat debutants ASEC Mimosas 2-1 in the African Women's Champions League final to become continental champions for the second time.

items.ja: 'Best display of season' but Chelsea rue missed opportunity

items.text_for_match: 'Best display of season' but Chelsea rue missed opportunity Having suffered plenty of past heartache at Barcelona's expense, Chelsea may have ordinarily celebrated a 1-1 Women's Champions League draw - but this was a missed opportunity.
